channel.title: TestScape Editted
channel.description:
Hola.
I found TestScape V0.9 somewhere in my C: drive, idk what it was doing there. So, I just decided that I would spiffy it up a bit, add some handlers and gave saves, etc. This is what I did so far:
[b][size=12pt][u]Updates for TestScape[/u][/size][/b] [code]Alot of logs, like chatlogs, pm logs, trade logs, etc. New information screen. Added trade, NPC, NPC spawn, NPC drop, playerSave and playerLoad handlers. Cleaned 12k lines of dead and unneeded codes from client.java. Added interfaces of information when clicking a skill tab. Finished black knight's fortress, dorik's quest and made a base for Dragon Slayer. Remade trading, works perfectly now. Fixed some items that were glitched (ignore the skirt, rofl). [/code]
[b][size=14pt]If you are looking for a complete base, this is not for you.[/size][/b] I just editted it a bit, and its really clean and stable. I think you can make something out of this if you tried :o
Here are some pictures as some requested: [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Testscape/pic1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Testscape/pic2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Testscape/pic3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Testscape/pic4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Testscape/pic5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Testscape/pic6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Testscape/pic7.png[/img]
Alrighty. That's about it; here's the download link: http://www.mediafire.com/?eytyqzniwzg Use any client, preferably MoparScape's: http://rs95.rapidshare.com/files/28641428/MoparScapeInstall.exe

item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:6, topic:339739”]wow, just downloaded this, needs abit more work,

for future reference, rewrite equipping, and maybe make some item on item and item on object handlers.[/quote]
Dude, I have better things to do like work on my project #462, I just released/fixed this up because it was bothering me in my C:/ drive.

Read full topic

Hola.

I found TestScape V0.9 somewhere in my C: drive, idk what it was doing there. So, I just decided that I would spiffy it up a bit, add some handlers and gave saves, etc. This is what I did so far:

[size=12pt]Updates for TestScape[/size]

Alot of logs, like chatlogs, pm logs, trade logs, etc. New information screen. Added trade, NPC, NPC spawn, NPC drop, playerSave and playerLoad handlers. I just editted it a bit, and its really clean and stable. I think you can make something out of this if you tried :o
